rounds_1_to_3.note: screening rounds — single judge per match

rounds_4_to_5.note: mid-tournament — two judges, escalate on disagreement

low_confidence_escalation.note: if any judge confidence < threshold, add one more judge

disagreement_escalation.note: if 2 judges split 1-1, call a 3rd from a different provider

early_stop.note: if first 2 judges agree unanimously, skip 3rd
